title: How to get started with affiliate marketing with no list and no budget for advertising - Quora

response.answer_text: You can do that by several ways… Even when you have no list, you still can promote the affiliate products or services… it’s correct that you’ll lose lots of opportunities to be able to promote again and again for those who bought from you, which means that you’re leaving lots of money on the table… But you still can do that till you become ready to start building your own subscribers list… Regarding the advertising, even if you have no budget to start with, you still can promote affiliate products and services in the free ways like… Social media’s, but you have to be careful doing that to not cause yourself to get banned by over promoting.Forums, you can search in the active forums for the niche similar to your products, and be active there to be able to build the relationships with others to gain the trust first.Commenting in others posts, you can search for the blogs that are related to your affiliate products and commenting useful comment not just spamming them, to get your link clicked to let them see your affiliate products.these are some of the ways that will help you to start out, and once you start earning money, then you’ll be able to invest in your business to get better and faster results.

Start with social media platforms. Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, etc. Start building your brand, getting your unique message out and start making some friends on those platforms.Answer questions here on the mighty Quora to show your interest and demonstrate your expertise on your topicStart visiting other websites in your chosen niche and get involved in the conversations going on thereAs you start to make some money, then you can move into paid ads on other options.
You need to build an audience somehow. Maybe try starting a YouTube channel
